meanings.definition: The act of establishing or locating the main office or center of operations in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The headquartering of the company in the city boosted local employment.
meanings.sent2: The headquartering of the organization in the new building was celebrated with a ribbon-cutting ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The headquartering of the team in the old warehouse made for an interesting work environment.
meanings.sent4: The headquartering of the business in the bustling downtown area symbolized growth and expansion.
meanings.sent5: The headquartering of the department in the renovated space brought a sense of unity and purpose.

meanings.definition: The process of providing headquarters or a central location for an organization or group.
meanings.sent1: After much planning, the headquartering of the club in the community center was finally complete.
meanings.sent2: The headquartering of the team at the stadium allowed for easy access to practice facilities.
meanings.sent3: The headquartering of the committee in the library sparked unexpected collaborations.
meanings.sent4: The headquartering of the association in the historic building added prestige to their image.
meanings.sent5: The headquartering of the group in the remote cabin created a sense of isolation and focus.
